meanings.definition: A plant of the sunflower family, typically with yellow or orange flowers.
meanings.sent1: The helenium in the garden bloomed beautifully this summer.
meanings.sent2: I planted some helenium in my backyard to add color.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the helenium, enjoying its nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a helenium in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The helenium swayed gently in the breeze, a splash of sunshine in the yard.
